page.title: 19Lawshall Area in General.
page.content: This rural area lacks many of the town facilities-there are no street lights and although most homes have electric- ity,mains water and sewage connections, some older properties in outlying areas are without these services. There is no gas supply at all.Essential services such as ambulance,fire,police,doctors, dentists,banks etc. are 15 minutes drive away. However,the countryside has a peaceful and calm way of life, the hustle and bustle of town does not exist here,people are more relaxed and have time for each other.Suffolk people are very friendly and sociable,a charac -teristic very noticable to anyone mov- ing into the area-and as long as you return the friendliness you are very soon accepted as part of the community. Although there is a saying hereabouts, you're not considered a local until you have lived here 20 years!
